page.title: 09Changing schools
page.content: My name is{Sarah Manuel}and I am 11 years old. Next term I am going to {Stanchester Comprehensive school}and I am absolutely dreading it! We took some{tests}to decide which class we would go into. Then a{teacher}from that school{came to talk}to us about detentions, dinners, not wearing jewellery,timetables, sports kit and lots of other things we should know. It feels strange to think that I'm going to be at the bottom of that school when I am at the top of this school now.There are five years in Stanchester and it will be weird to have the older pupils telling me what to do.I hope they don't bully me!! It will be awful to have tons of {homework}each night because here we have very little.Right now I wish I didn't have to go, but I expect I shall soon feel at home there.
